Title: The Countdown
Plot: An emergency visit to the hospital results in Frank receiving devastating news, prompting him to embark on an orgy of drink and drug-fuelled mayhem, which culminates in a bizarre, drug-induced encounter with his younger self. Elsewhere, Lillian comes up with a surprising way to make money, and Lip's shady past catches up with him and leads to a no-holds-barred fight in The Jockey, with shocking consequences.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material
GuestStars: Alice Grice, Alex Moxam, PJ Devlin, Mary Sobers, Darren Connelly, Karen Bryson, Roger Kennedy, Emily Bowker, Craig Shepherd
